name: Shaded Shapes 2
description:
Another version of Shaded Shapes where you control a rainbow box to the checkered box, there are 20 levels in this game. This new version only allows movement by taking away the ability to jump. You will already have access to all 20 levels within the menu so feel free to choose any level or play through them all as you like it.

Controls

Move left - arrow key [<] or [A] key --- Move right - arrow key [>] or [D] key.

Press the [escape] key to return to the menu.

More Info on game N Blank

This game is for experimentation on mechanics. Do expect that this game will have janky controls, more out of whack collisions and, mechanics sometimes breaking.

These levels are easy to finish however if you were to get stuck on a level then you can press the escape key to return to the main menu.

Any comments on my game, whether it be positive or negative, to help me improve on what I could work harder in the future (or something).

Don't expect a game like mine to be fun, I'm sure it would not be entertaining when playing my game. If things don't go as you like it, you can always delete the game.
